page.title: 18MY DAILY ROUTINE
page.content: In the mornings, in our house, it is my dad who gets up first on the weekdays, it is normally some time between 4 a.m. and 5 a.m.. Then my brother has to get up to go to work as well. After my brother has gone my mother gets up and she gets me up for school. I don't bother to get dressed until I have had my Rice Krispies and a drink. I then go back upstairs and get dressed. At about 8.30 a.m. I go round to my friend Lorraine's and call for her and we sometimes go down to the shops. Then we go on to school. After school I go home and get changed. Sometimes I go and call for Lorraine and/or Samantha and then we go down to the Green. We either play on the Green or watch the boys playing football, sometimes Lorraine joins in with them.
